devdoc.title: contains the data structures utilized in the heirloom marketplace;

BoughtFromSale(uint256,uint256,address,u.notice: emitted after a license is bought from a sale

CommissionUpdated(uint96).notice: emitted after the commission basis points is updated

EscrowUpdated(address).notice: emitted after the treasury is updated

LicenseListed(uint256,uint256,address,ui.notice: emitted after a license is listed by a user

LicenseSold(uint256,uint256,address,addr.notice: emitted after a license is listed by a user

ListedLicenseClosed(uint256,uint256,addr.notice: emitted after a listed license is closed

ListingFeeUpdated(uint256).notice: emitted after the listing fee is updated

SaleActivated(uint256).notice: emitted after a (future) sale is activated

TokenUpdated(address).notice: emitted after the treasury is updated

TreasuryUpdated(address).notice: emitted after the treasury is updated

UserVerified(address).notice: emitted after the treasury is updated
